name: GetDiscountByID
description: Get Discount by the given Discount ID
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Customer` or `Api`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Discount`

E.name: FinancialDispersion
E.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - DivideInProportionToProductPrice
* `1` - MostExpensiveToCheapest
* `2` - CheapestToMostExpensive
* `3` - HighestToLowestTaxRate
* `4` - LowestToHighestTaxRate

CH.name: OrderProperties
CH.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - IsPickup
* `2` - CreatedByEmployee
* `4` - IsInterbranch
* `8` - IsB2B
* `16` - Duplicated
* `32` - Autocompleted
* `128` - ReturnToSupplier
* `256` - CustomTaxesApplied
* `512` - Replenishment
* `1024` - SoldByOverridden
* `2048` - ImportedFromLiveGuard
* `4096` - IsTransferOrder
* `8192` - IsReturnsTransferOrder
* `16384` - IsOffer
* `32768` - IsUnified
* `65536` - IsReturned
* `131072` - HasReturnLines
* `262144` - DownPayment
* `524288` - Restitution
* `1048576` - Repairs
* `2097152` - IsReturnReversal

* `131072` - Mobile
* `262144` - ConcessionStore

BR.name: ID

CU.name: Code
CU.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

CU.name: Message
CU.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

CU.name: RequestID
CU.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

CU.name: Type
CU.description: A short description of the error type.

CV.name: ExternalIDs
CV.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

CV.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
CV.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

CV.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
CV.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

CW.name: ID
CW.description: This is the ID of a `Role`

C.name: ActionType
C.description:
Possible values:

* `V2:DISCOUNTAMOUNT`
* `V2:CUSTOMERAGE`
* `V2:TIEREDCUSTOMERAGE`
* `V2:GENERATEDISCOUNTCOUPON`
* `V2:GETAPRODUCT`
* `V2:LOYALTYTIEREDDISCOUNTAMOUNT`
* `V2:LOYALTYTIEREDDISCOUNTPERCENTAGE`
* `V2:ORDERTIEREDDISCOUNTAMOUNT`
* `V2:ORDERTIEREDDISCOUNTPERCENTAGE`
* `V2:ORIGINATINGORDERDISCOUNT`
* `V2:OTHERCOSTS`
* `V2:DISCOUNTPERCENTAGE`
* `V2:TIEREDPICKAPRODUCT`
* `V2:PRODUCTAMOUNTTIEREDDISCOUNTAMOUNT`
* `V2:PRODUCTAMOUNTTIEREDDISCOUNTPERCENTAGE`
* `V2:PRODUCTQUANTITYTIEREDDISCOUNTAMOUNT`
* `V2:PRODUCTQUANTITYTIEREDDISCOUNTPERCENTAGE`
* `V2:PRODUCTSETDISCOUNTAMOUNT`
* `V2:PRODUCTSETFIXEDPRICE`
* `V2:PRODUCTSETFREEPRODUCT`
* `V2:PRODUCTSETDISCOUNTPERCENTAGE`
* `V2:CUSTOMFIELDVALUEDETERMINEDDISCOUNT`
* `DEFAULT`
